reviews.review_msg: Terrible experience. Hate algorithm from now onwards.

Absolutely horrible. I've never dropped below an A- in any class taken so far (half-way through third year) and I finished with a C+. Most arrogant person I've ever had to deal with. Lectures were painfully disorganized, tests were completely unfair. She's not just hard, she's malicious. Take the class with someone else.
